data.eml:eml: A revision of the Neotropical tortoise beetle genus Eurypedus Gistel 1834 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shin, Chulwoo (2016): A revision of the Neotropical tortoise beetle genus Eurypedus Gistel 1834 (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae). Zootaxa 4161 (3): 329-344, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.3.2
